text: Philippe Harache (born 12 April 1954 in Orbec) is a French aerospace engineer and businessman. He is the former Vice-President of Eurocopter.Official Opening of Eurocopter Malaysia’s Regional Maintenance Centre State-of-the-art Facility Enlarges Regional Footprint of the World’s Number One Helicopter CompanyEurocopter inaugure un centre de services clients à Hong Kong Graduate from Institut polytechnique des sciences avancées (1976), Paris 1 Panthéon- Sorbonne University, INSEAD and Harvard University, Philippe Harache started his career in 1978 as Helicopter engineer. Philippe Harache In 1982, he was President of Samaero at Singapore. Philippe HARACHE Philippe Harache, Directeur Executif Customers d'Eurocopter He became Vice-President of Eurocopter in 2001.Malaysian Maritime Enforcement Agency takes delivery of its third Eurocopter Dauphin AS365 N3 He retired in 2010. Christian Gras devient vice-président d'Eurocopter Christian Gras promu numéro deux d’Eurocopter Since 2002, he has also been an adviser of France. title: Philippe Harache
